attributes.action: Help fund new premises for Somerton House Surgery in Midsomer Norton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our surgery lacks facilities for delivering new services according to the Government Agenda. Our space is used in rotation for our doctors and nurses, our corridors are not very wide which inhibits wheelchair users and stretchers. If you sign this petition you are in agreement with us and our fight for new premises.
